Package it.escape.core.client.controller.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientProceduresInterface
    This interface contains the methods that are in UpdaterSwing.
    UpdaterSwingToViewInterface
    This interface contains the methods in the Swing View that can be invoked directly by the UpdaterSwing.

    This is a Listener on the JTextField that contains your name, that you can use to modify.

    Updates the GUIModel and/or sends commands to the GUIView when a new network message arrives
